alert.note: Alert for Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 8:21AM CDT until June 02 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas...Missouri... Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne affecting Linn KS County. Marais Des Cygnes River near Trading Post affecting Bates and Linn KS Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie affecting Miami County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Low-lying areas along the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 27.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 28.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Thu 1pm 1am 1pm Marais Des Cygnes River Osawatomie 28.0 27.7 Wed 8am 28.1 26.7 25.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
